#Introduction

Write some words about the paper and the methods.

```{r data,warn=FALSE,cache=TRUE,echo=TRUE}
library(m2b)
str(track_CAGA_005)
#convert to xybt object with computation of windows operators and some quantiles
xy<-xytb(track_CAGA_005,desc="example track",
	 winsize=seq(3,15,2),idquant=seq(0,1,.25),move=c(5,10,15))
#a simple plot method
plot(xy)
#a model (the function modelRF update the model inside the xytb object)
xy<-modelRF(xy,type="actual",ntree=501,mtry=15)
#compare prediction and observation
plot(xy@b$b,xy@predb$b)

```
